Name:
Foote
HMS Roxborough

Zhyostky ("Rigid")
(or Doblestny ("Valiant")
Builder: Fore River Shipbuilding Company, Quincy, Massachusetts
Fate:
Transferred to United Kingdom, 23 September 1940
Transferred to USSR, 1 August 1944
Returned to UK, 7 February 1949 for scrapping, 14 May 1949
Armament:
4 × 4 in (102 mm)/50 guns
12 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
1 × Depth charge projector
